column5: For anyone who has met Jim, you know he is one of the most genuine guys out there. Always willing to give a tip or have a chat with a casual angler or someone looking to take fishing more seriously.  Some excellent prizes up for grabs here but the most important thing is helping out a friend.  here is the link   http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=19874  anyone looking to donate can PM Matt for tickets, I will have a block next week as well.  Any corporate donations are appreciated as well. I am working on a separate draw for anyone who is an OFC member that buys tickets.  Thanks to everyone who has already supported this great cause  Jamie
we have donated lures for the raffle. we are also waiting for tickets. jim being involved in the outdoors has always helped folks. why not help him.

Good job guys...Thanks Jamie...  Tickets purchased last week were mailed out on Thurs...so look for them in the mail early next week..    Great bait donation...I'll let you know when it arrives...  Thanks  Matt
Thank you everyone for the interest !
PM me or Matt for more info
feel free to PM us--we can probably add to the cause  Good Luck!  ID1

Went to one of his seminars at the Sportsman Show a few years ago.  It was in the afternoon on a weekday.  My buddy and I ended up being the only ones in attendance.  Spent the hour just listening to stories that he normally wouldn't tell during a seminar.  My gut ached from laughing so hard. Have met hime several times since at BPS.  Just a genuine good person. Jamie, you have a PM
I got my raffle tickets today and sent em off

Glad to hear they arrived HTHM  I hope to have to do that lots more for all the OFC'RS...  There is also going to be a major announcement regarding the draws soon, so many donations we have opportunity to add another draw package.  So you see it's growing all the time  Just e-mail you address and how many tickets you want and I'll send you your tickets...it's for a great cause and as I said before 100% goes to Big Jim.  Cheers  Matt Clay
